text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
author: William Plomer

text: Creativity is a drug I cannot live without.
author: Cecil B. DeMille

text: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: Creativity is contagious. Pass it on.
author: Albert Einstein

text: To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough.
author: Osho

text: Creativity takes courage.
author: Henri Matisse

text: Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine and at last, you create what you will.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: The desire to create is one of the deepest yearnings of the human soul.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

text: Creativity is the way I share my soul with the world.
author: Brene Brown

text: The most creative act you will ever undertake is the act of creating yourself.
author: Deepak Chopra

text: The creative adult is the child who survived.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

text: Creativity is just connecting things.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Creativity is the process of having original ideas that have value.
author: Ken Robinson

text: Creativity is the way I share my soul with the world.
author: Brene Brown

text: Creativity is not a talent, it's a way of operating.
author: John Cleese

text: Creativity is the power to act.
author: Ai Weiwei

text: Creativity is a highfalutin word for the work I have to do between now and Tuesday.
author: Ray Kroc

text: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
author: Ken Robinson

text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

text: Creativity is the sudden cessation of stupidity.
author: Edwin H. Land

text: Creativity is just connecting things.
author: Steve Jobs

text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Creativity is the ability to introduce order into the randomness of nature.
author: Eric Hoffer

text: Creativity is the process of bringing something new into being.
author: Rollo May

text: The truly creative mind in any field is no more than this: A human creature born abnormally, inhumanely sensitive.
author: Pearl S. Buck

text: Creativity is the power to act.
author: Ai Weiwei

text: Creativity is not the finding of a thing, but the making something out of it after it is found.
author: James Russell Lowell

text: Creativity is allowing oneself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

text: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
author: Twyla Tharp

text: Creativity takes courage.
author: Henri Matisse

text: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
author: Edgar Degas

text: The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct.
author: Carl Jung

text: Creativity is a way to share your soul with the world.
author: Marianne Williamson

text: Creativity is the process of having original ideas that have value.
author: Ken Robinson

text: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

text: Creativity is not the clever rearranging of the known, it is the unknown.
author: Terence McKenna

text: Creativity is the power of imagination.
author: Ken Robinson

text: Creativity is seeing what others see and thinking what no one else has ever thought.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Creativity is inventing, experimenting, growing, taking risks, breaking rules, making mistakes, and having fun.
